section.p: The little girl runs off before you can talk to her. You thread your way through the pitted tombstones and brooding crypts of the cemetery, under a pale moon that bathes the graveyard in a sickly, pallid light.

Suddenly, a foul stench fills your nostrils, and a figure rises up out of the shadows! Yellow eyes glow with feral blood-lust, and the creature sinks its black teeth into your arm before you can react. Lose 4 Stamina.

choices.choice: Invoke the power of the gods
Use salt and iron filings, if you have any
